requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: VR HMD Required
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: VR HMD Required
